sub_title: Reduce plastic waste through Edibles.eco! Co-Founder @ Edibles.eco
summary:
Enthusiastic dude with passion for technology and business, eager to learn. Looking for unique opportunities to push me outside of my comfort zone and exemplify my talents of which I was unaware of. 

You know there a saying, "A jack of all trades, master of none" but we forget the actual full quote and only say the first part, the full quote is actually "A jack of all trades is a master of none, but oftentimes better than a master of one"

volunteer_experiences.description: I used to spread the message on what the Brave Software does. Brave is a blockchain-based digital advertising platform. Internet users who browse the web using Brave's free web browser (available at Brave.com) can choose to replace the ads they see with ads on Brave's ad network. Users then receive BAT from advertisers as compensation for their attention. Unfortunately ever since they concentrated on full monetization of their platform I lost interest, all of these things start because of the users but then I hey quickly change.
